entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
